root: ^(The shadows are thicker here. The air smells of rust and secrets. You've made it — to the heart of the Ghost King's lair.)

intro: ^GHOST KING: You clawed your way through every illusion, every minion... and now you stand before my vault?
monsters: ^GHOST KING: You’re bold, little flame. But not everything here is what it seems. Some chests hold truth. Others — teeth.
game: ^(The final trial. The stolen memories whisper from within the chests. But the Ghost King has twisted them — only one holds what you seek.)
Win_game: ^GHOST KING: Impossible... You’ve undone what I shattered.
Lose_game: ^GHOST KING: Hahaha! Futile! There goes all hope of seeing your master again.

b: ^(The final memory glows in your paws. It hums with warmth — a promise of return.)
^(The chests vanish in smoke. But somewhere in the dark, the final memory still calls to you.)
